originalText.text: My dental experience has always been a great one here, from the front desk to the dental assistance and the best Hygienist the Doctors are good as well. I would and have recommended City Dental to my friends, family and peers. Thank you for always showing me and my son a great experience!

text.text: My dental experience has always been a great one here, from the front desk to the dental assistance and the best Hygienist the Doctors are good as well. I would and have recommended City Dental to my friends, family and peers. Thank you for always showing me and my son a great experience!

originalText.text:
Very nice and friendly staff at the front desk. Dr. Kim and Dr. Papando are very professional and at the same time easy to talk to.
They are detail-oriented and always know how to explain complicated processes in Layman’s terms. Hygienist Kateryna has also been taking a very good care of my teeth for over 2 years. Definitely recommend them to everyone who is looking for a trustworthy dental clinic.

text.text:
Very nice and friendly staff at the front desk. Dr. Kim and Dr. Papando are very professional and at the same time easy to talk to.
They are detail-oriented and always know how to explain complicated processes in Layman’s terms. Hygienist Kateryna has also been taking a very good care of my teeth for over 2 years. Definitely recommend them to everyone who is looking for a trustworthy dental clinic.

originalText.text:
I have just returned home from a remarkable visit with Dr Val Atsen. For the last few years I have been seen by a number of the good doctors and talented assistants there and have always been pleased with the treatment I was given. But today is truly exceptional.

I am an old man who never really took care of his teeth properly when I was younger and so when I began with them I was in poor dental health and my teeth were misshapen to the extent that I would rarely smile openly in group photos or other occasions to show my pleasure with whatever the event was.
As of today, I have healthy teeth and gums and the best smile of my life.
Thank you kindly

originalText.text:
I recently started going to CityDental and it was the best decision I ever made. The moment you enter the facility you are greeted with courtesy and respect.
A dental visit can be stressful.  However,
Dr. Anis Papando and his assistant made my first visit stress free and very comfortable.  The level of care and service I received…well it was incredible!  I wish I had discovered this practice sooner.                   Dr. Papando is consummate professional. I totally trust his advice, for he takes the time to explain the issues and then the best procedure to resolve it. CityDental will work with your insurance provider to ensure that your benefits will cover the cost for services rendered.  I would highly recommend CityDental for all your dental work.

originalText.text: What an amazing experience!!  I had an emergency and they were able to take care of me. The dentist did an amazing job and the staff is so kind and friendly. Highly recommend going there!
